#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
int main(){
       string x;
       char y;
       int count=0,len;
       
       getline(cin,x);
       cin >> y;
       
       len = x.length();
       
       for(int i=0;i<len;i++)
         if(x[i] == y)
           count++;
         
       cout << count << endl;
       
       return 0;
       }
